home.subtitle: Premium sunflower oil producer - Homepage coming soon.

expertise.label: ABOUT US
expertise.title: Our Expertise
paragraphs: We are a producer of high-quality edible oils with a strong focus on sunflower oil and carefully selected raw materials. Our production process is built on consistency, quality control, and respect for natural ingredients.
From seed selection to final bottling, every step is carefully monitored to ensure purity, stability, and reliable performance in everyday cooking and professional use.
Our goal is simple — to deliver oils that meet high quality standards and earn long-term trust.

privateLabelSolutions.label: Private Label Solutions
privateLabelSolutions.subtitle: Your Brand. Our Expertise.
paragraphs: We offer comprehensive private label solutions for partners looking to develop or expand their edible oil portfolio under their own brand.
With modern production facilities, advanced quality control, and flexible packaging capabilities, we ensure reliable and high-quality products tailored to your market needs.

productionExcellence.title: Our Production Excellence
productionExcellence.subtitle: Where technology, quality and reliability come together

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing technology
manufacturing.description: Built with state-of-the-art technology and equipment from world-renowned manufacturers such as Alfa Laval (Sweden) and Kerting (Germany), ensuring precision and reliability in every stage of production.

refining.title: Refining the raw material
refining.description: Our refining process transforms raw sunflower oil into 100% premium quality oil, optimized for taste, purity, color and extended shelf life — meeting the highest consumer standards.

capacity.title: Daily capacity
capacity.description: With a daily capacity of 100 tons, OstrogLuna ensures consistent availability. Ready-made BISER cooking oil is stored in modern warehouses, prepared for fast distribution to customers.

productionInAction.title: Our Production in Action
productionInAction.subtitle: A closer look at our technology, processes and quality standards

productRange.title: Product Range
productRange.subtitle: High-quality oils under your private label

flexiblePackagingSolutions.title: Flexible Packaging Solutions
paragraphs: We offer a wide range of packaging options for crude and refined oils at competitive prices — from retail bottles and food service packs to bulk shipments.
As one of the leading exporters of packed oils in North Macedonia, we can meet high-volume demands at any time.
We provide fully customizable labels tailored to your market requirements. Private label production available for retail and catering partners.

items.production: Production, filling, and packaging under your brand
items.labeling: Labeling adapted to your market requirements
items.quality: Consistent quality control at every stage

hero.label: BISER OIL
hero.title:
Decades of Trust in
Every Drop
paragraphs: The well-known brand that dates back more than 27 years on the domestic market and beyond – 100% sunflower edible oil "BISER" maintains the high quality and the well-deserved trust of its consumers. From 2023 became part of the Oil Refinery company "OSTROG-LUNA" – Strumica – North Macedonia.
"BISER" is a high-quality, 100% natural, and refined edible sunflower oil used for cooking, frying, and baking. Also, it can be used for preparing salads, dressings, and mayonnaise.
It is rich with vitamin E and polyunsaturated fatty acids. It contains the natural characteristics of the sunflower seeds from which it is produced.

guarantee.title: A Guarantee of Quality and Trust
paragraphs: The oil is refined to the highest quality to ensure a healthy and balanced diet because it is a daily used food in the household.

The edible sunflower oil "BISER" is produced in the technologically most modern factory. The team of high-quality engineers and technicians, the advanced technology controlled according to IFS standards and the long-standing epithet "oil number 1 in North Macedonia" are a guarantee for the high quality of "BISER" sunflower oil.

items.containers: ISO-certified 20ft and 40ft tank containers provide secure and efficient bulk transport of edible oil. Designed specifically for food-grade liquids, they ensure safe and reliable delivery across regional and international routes.
items.storage: High-quality stainless steel storage tanks ensure safe and hygienic preservation of edible oil. Temperature-controlled and food-grade certified, they maintain product quality at every stage.
items.vessel: Specialized tanker vessels allow large-scale international delivery of edible oil under strict quality and safety standards.

termsOfUse.title: Website Terms of Use

informational.title: Informational Purposes
informational.content: While Ostrog Luna strives to provide accurate and up-to-date information, we are not liable for any errors, omissions, or inaccuracies in the content displayed on this website.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, including text, logos, and images, is the exclusive intellectual property of Ostrog Luna. Unauthorized reproduction is prohibited.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Ostrog Luna shall not be liable for any direct or indirect loss resulting from the use of this website.

jurisdiction.title: Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.content: Any disputes arising from the use of this website or these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the competent courts of Strumica, Republic of North Macedonia.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.intro: This website uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze our traffic.

strictlyNecessary.title: Strictly Necessary Cookies
strictlyNecessary.content: Essential for the website's basic functionality and security.

analytical.title: Analytical Cookies
analytical.content: We use tools like Google Analytics to understand user behavior and improve our services, subject to your prior consent.

management.title: Management
management.content: You may withdraw your consent or manage your cookie preferences at any time via your browser settings or our website's consent banner.

cookiePolicy.contactNote: For any questions regarding our Cookie Policy, please contact us at:

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy & Data Protection Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Ostrog Luna complies with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the North Macedonia Law on Personal Data Protection.

dataController.title: Data Controller
dataController.content: Ostrog Luna, Atanas Mucev no.2, 2400 Strumica, Republic of North Macedonia.

purpose.title: Purpose of Processing
purpose.content: We collect and process business contact information solely for the execution of trade contracts, KYC (Know Your Customer) compliance, responding to inquiries submitted through our contact form, and website optimization.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Under applicable data protection legislation, you have the right to access, rectify, or erase your personal data, and the right to restrict or object to processing.

privacyPolicy.contactNote: For any data-related inquiries, please contact us at:

whistleblowerPolicy.title: Whistleblowing & Integrity Policy
whistleblowerPolicy.intro: Ostrog Luna is committed to the highest standards of transparency and ethical conduct. In accordance with applicable North Macedonia whistleblower protection legislation and the EU Whistleblower Protection Directive (2019/1937), we provide a secure channel for employees, contractors, and partners to report suspected misconduct, fraud, or environmental breaches.

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
confidentiality.content: All reports are handled with the highest level of anonymity and strict confidentiality.

noRetaliation.title: No Retaliation
noRetaliation.content: We strictly prohibit any form of retaliation, discrimination, or adverse treatment against any person who reports a breach in good faith.

reportingChannel.title: Reporting Channel
reportingChannel.content: Reports should be submitted to our Compliance Officer at:

whistleblowerPolicy.contactNote: For any questions regarding this policy, please contact us at:

certifications.title: Certifications
certifications.description: Our certifications demonstrate our dedication to quality, safety, and internationally recognized standards in edible oil production and packaging.
